summary:
This Mod allows you to Craft, Improve and Enchant unique Weapons and Daedric Artefacts as NON-ENCHANTED version!
This mod is still work in progress so please stay tuned. I\\\\\\\'m going to add some unique armors and more weapons.
If you want me to add something special just leave a comment.

Weapons available so far:

33 Weapons available.
descriptionHtml:
This Mod allows you to Craft, Improve and Enchant unique Weapons and Daedric Artefacts as NON-ENCHANTED version!
This mod is still work in progress so please stay tuned. I\\\\\\\'m going to add some unique armors and more weapons.
If you want me to add something special just leave a comment.

Weapons available so far:

-Chillrend
-Rueful Axe
-Volendrung
-Mehrunes\\\\\\\' Razor
-Ebony Blade
-Mace of Molag Bal
-Rusty Mace
-Sanguine Rose
-Wabbajack
-Skull of Corruption
-Blade of Woe
-Ghostblade
-Dawnbreaker
-The Pale Blade
-Staff of Magnus
-Nightingale Blade
-Nightingale Bow

Update 1.1:

-Woodcutter\'s Axe
-Dragonpriest Dagger
-Headsman\'s Axe
-Falmer Bow
-Falmer Bow Upple
-Falmer Sword
-Falmer Sword Honed
-Falmer War Axe
-Falmer War Axe Honed
-Forsworn Axe
-Forsworn Bow
-Forsworn Staff
-Forsworn Sword
-Silver Greatsword
-Silver Sword
-Pickaxe

Update 1.12:

Added Hircines Ring

Update 1.13:

Added Wuuthrad

Update 1.14:

Added Dragonbane

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Bugs: Enchanting for Staffs doesn\\\\\\\'t work yet, but I\\\\\\\'m working on fixing it. If you find any other bugs please report in the comments.

Latest Version: BETA 1.0

Fell free to leave a comment if you like it and please give me a feedback.
Hope this mod will help you and have a nice day!
author: T3rRoR_SoLdi3R
